## News Review for blue-prism

# Blue Prism News Review

## Executive Summary

Blue Prism continues to maintain its position as a key player in the rapidly expanding robotic process automation market, which is projected to grow from USD 28.31 billion in 2025 to USD 247.34 billion by 2035 at a 24.20% CAGR, according to a [recent market research report](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2025/12/16/3206126/0/en/Robotic-Process-Automation-RPA-Market-Size-Expands-from-USD-35-27-Bn-in-2026-to-USD-247-34-Bn-by-2035-Fueled-by-AI-Powered-Automation-and-Digitalization.html). The company, which was acquired by Vista Equity Partners for $1.5 billion in 2021 with plans for integration with Tibco Software, is recognized for its enterprise-grade platform featuring high scalability, visual process design capabilities, and robust execution engine. Blue Prism has also been identified in the [commercial vehicle AI applications market](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2025/12/22/3209036/28124/en/Commercial-Vehicles-AI-Applications-Market-Research-Report-2024-2029-Revolutionizing-Fleet-Efficiency-Supporting-Autonomous-Driving-and-Boosting-Design-and-Supply-Chain-Processes.html), suggesting potential expansion beyond traditional RPA into vehicle automation and fleet management operations.

## Key Developments

- **Market Recognition**: Blue Prism was listed among key RPA players alongside UiPath, Automation Anywhere, and Microsoft Power Automate in the quality testing and certifications segment of the RPA value chain, according to [market research](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2025/12/16/3206126/0/en/Robotic-Process-Automation-RPA-Market-Size-Expands-from-USD-35-27-Bn-in-2026-to-USD-247-34-Bn-by-2035-Fueled-by-AI-Powered-Automation-and-Digitalization.html)

- **Ownership Structure**: Vista Equity Partners completed the acquisition of Blue Prism Group for approximately $1.5 billion in 2021, with planned integration with Tibco Software

- **Market Expansion**: Blue Prism appears in research covering the [commercial vehicle AI applications market](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2025/12/22/3209036/28124/en/Commercial-Vehicles-AI-Applications-Market-Research-Report-2024-2029-Revolutionizing-Fleet-Efficiency-Supporting-Autonomous-Driving-and-Boosting-Design-and-Supply-Chain-Processes.html), indicating potential expansion into vehicle automation and fleet management

## Market Context

The RPA market's strong growth trajectory, with on-premises deployment models dominating at 68.13% revenue share in 2025, aligns well with Blue Prism's enterprise-grade platform capabilities. The company's positioning in both traditional RPA applications for back office operations, human resources, healthcare, and customer service, as well as emerging markets like commercial vehicle automation, demonstrates the expanding scope of automation technologies. The market's evolution toward AI-powered automation creates opportunities for Blue Prism to leverage its scalable platform architecture.

## Strategic Implications

Blue Prism's recognition across multiple automation markets positions the company to capitalize on the expanding RPA sector while potentially diversifying into new verticals like commercial vehicle automation. The Vista Equity Partners ownership and planned Tibco integration may reshape Blue Prism's market strategy and product offerings, potentially creating synergies between RPA and broader enterprise software capabilities. The company's emphasis on enterprise-grade features like high scalability and robust execution engines aligns with market preferences for on-premises solutions, providing competitive advantages in serving large enterprise customers seeking secure, scalable automation platforms.

## Individual Articles

### Article 1: Commercial Vehicles AI Applications Market Research Report 2024-2029: Revolutionizing Fleet Efficiency, Supporting Autonomous Driving, and Boosting Design and Supply Chain Processes

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2025/12/22/3209036/28124/en/Commercial-Vehicles-AI-Applications-Market-Research-Report-2024-2029-Revolutionizing-Fleet-Efficiency-Supporting-Autonomous-Driving-and-Boosting-Design-and-Supply-Chain-Processes.html)

## Summary

Blue Prism appears in a market research report examining AI applications in the commercial vehicle industry, which identifies work order automation as a key trend driving AI adoption. The report lists Blue Prism among companies operating in this space, suggesting the automation vendor may be expanding its presence in commercial vehicle fleet management operations, though no specific details about Blue Prism's products or strategies in this market are provided.



---

### Article 2: Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Market Size Expands from USD 35.27 Bn in 2026 to USD 247.34 Bn by 2035 Fueled by AI-Powered Automation and Digitalization

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2025/12/16/3206126/0/en/Robotic-Process-Automation-RPA-Market-Size-Expands-from-USD-35-27-Bn-in-2026-to-USD-247-34-Bn-by-2035-Fueled-by-AI-Powered-Automation-and-Digitalization.html)

## Summary

Blue Prism was recognized as a key player in the rapidly growing RPA market, which is projected to reach USD 247.34 billion by 2035. The company was acquired by Vista Equity Partners for $1.5 billion in 2021 with plans for integration with Tibco Software. Blue Prism's platform is characterized by high scalability, visual process design capabilities, and robust execution engine, positioning it to serve enterprise customers in back office operations, human resources, healthcare, and customer service automation as the market continues its strong growth trajectory.
